data.question: What is the highest ethylene/ethane selectivity observed under relevant conditions for Fe2(m-dobdc)?
Which metal variant of M2(m-dobdc) shows the highest propylene/propane selectivity?
How does the charge density at the metal site affect olefin/paraffin selectivity in M2(m-dobdc) frameworks?
data.answer: Increased charge density at the metal site leads to stronger olefin binding and higher selectivity.

data.question: Is the adsorption of olefins in M2(m-dobdc) frameworks reversible under mild regeneration conditions?
What is the role of coordinatively unsaturated M2+ sites in M2(m-dobdc) frameworks?
data.answer: They lead to superior performance for the physisorptive separation of ethylene from ethane and propylene from propane.

data.question: Can M2(m-dobdc) frameworks produce high purity olefins without a temperature swing?
What is the significance of the differential enthalpy calculations for olefin binding in M2(m-dobdc) frameworks?
data.answer: They indicate that these adsorbents maintain sufficient reversibility under mild regeneration conditions.

data.question: Do M2(m-dobdc) frameworks exhibit fast kinetics for ethylene adsorption?
What is the effect of the meta-substituted H4(m-dobdc) ligand on the M2(m-dobdc) framework?
data.answer: It leads to enhanced metal-olefin interactions due to increased charge density at the metal site.

data.question: Are M2(m-dobdc) frameworks derived from low-cost raw materials?
What is the olefin capacity of Fe2(m-dobdc) for ethylene?
How does the adsorption enthalpy for ethylene compare between Ni2(m-dobdc) and Fe2(m-dobdc)?
data.answer: Fe2(m-dobdc) and Ni2(m-dobdc) have similar ethylene adsorption enthalpies.

data.question: Is the adsorption of ethylene in Fe2(m-dobdc) faster than 30 seconds?
What is the crystal system of Co2(m-dobdc)Â·2.0C2H4?
Does the adsorption of propylene in M2(m-dobdc) frameworks depend on the metal variant?
What is the effect of temperature on the IAST selectivity for ethylene/ethane separation in M2(m-dobdc) frameworks?
data.answer: Selectivity is expected to improve at reduced temperatures.

data.question: Can M2(m-dobdc) frameworks achieve polymer grade purity for olefins?
What is the role of the high-spin metal(II) centers in M2(m-dobdc) frameworks?
data.answer: They bind ethylene through weak reversible interactions.

data.question: Are M2(m-dobdc) frameworks capable of discriminating between small molecules like light olefins and paraffins?
What is the significance of the breakthrough measurements for Co2(m-dobdc)?
data.answer: They indicate the framework's ability to discriminate between olefins and paraffins under realistic process conditions.
